subject: Measures of Secure Coding & How to apply Secure Coding Standards?
Description: Up to 90% of software security problems are caused by coding errors, which is why secure coding practices and secure coding standards are essential.

subject: Hacktoberfest & Open Source 2021
Description: In this episode, we talk about Open Source and the annual event Hacktoberfest. We answer your questions about getting started with Open Source, the best practices, and how it could help advance your career.

subject: Async/Await: Pythonist Note
Description: The syntax async def introduces either a native coroutine or an asynchronous generator. The expressions async with and async for are also valid. The keyword await passes function control back to the event loop.

subject: FastAPI: Create a Modern API with a High Performance Framework
Description: As Python grows in popularity, the variety of high-quality frameworks available to developers has blossomed. In addition to steadfast options like Django and Flask, there are many new options including FastAPI.
